doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This series consists of NYFA's financial records, including final reports for NYSCA, Challenge III Grant development materials, National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) proposals, and the National Endowment for the Arts (NEA) grant materials. The NYSCA Grant confirmations document project descriptions and fund disbursal for various organizations, such as the Black American Heritage Foundation, Queens Symphony Orchestra, and the Music Theatre Group. These materials document the ways in which NYFA provides concrete resources to working artists and emerging arts organizations, and illustrates NYFA's partnerships with endowment and philanthropic agencies. This series also includes materials concerning the organization's Revolving Fund program providing cash flow loans to organizations under approved grants by the New York City Department of Cultural Affairs (NYSCA).
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
